sentence: And I was happy to welcome him back, and to congratulate him on the courage of Liz Cheney.
author: Rebecca Beitsch
title: Dick Cheney visits Capitol for Jan. 6, criticizes GOP leadership

sentence: g: Republican leaders forged an agreement this week to potentially fund a challenger to Rep. Liz Cheney in Wyoming, and party members are expected to formally condemn her for her work on the Jan. 6 committee [today], an unprecedented rebuke of an incumbent member of Congress,? our colleague Josh Dawsey reports.
title: Ten questions for Steny Hoyer
